R

recover() - Method in class cscd212classes.lifeform.Alien
The recover method delegates the calculation of the recovery points to the aggregated recovery object and returns a String representing the points recovered.
recovery - Variable in class cscd212classes.lifeform.Alien
The RecoveryBehavior object representing this Alien's current recovery behavior.
RecoveryBehavior - Interface in cscd212interfaces.recovery
The RecoveryBehavior interface.
RecoveryFractional - Class in cscd212classes.recovery
The implementation of RecoveryBehavior that represents recovery based on percentage of total life points.
RecoveryFractional(double) - Constructor for class cscd212classes.recovery.RecoveryFractional
The constructor to create a RecoveryFractional object which sets this recoveryPercent to the passed parameter and then sets the BASE_RECOVERY to a default of 10.
RecoveryFractional(double, int) - Constructor for class cscd212classes.recovery.RecoveryFractional
The constructor to create a RecoveryFractional object which sets this recoveryPercent and BASE_RECOVERY to the passed parameters.
RecoveryLinear - Class in cscd212classes.recovery
The implementation of RecoveryBehavior that represents recovery by a set and independent amount.
RecoveryLinear(int) - Constructor for class cscd212classes.recovery.RecoveryLinear
The constructor to create a RecoveryLinear object which sets this recoveryStep to the passed parameter.
RecoveryNone - Class in cscd212classes.recovery
The implementation of RecoveryBehavior that represents no recovery.
RecoveryNone() - Constructor for class cscd212classes.recovery.RecoveryNone
 
recoveryPercent - Variable in class cscd212classes.recovery.RecoveryFractional
The double which represents the percentage of total life points to be returned when calculating recovery.
recoveryStep - Variable in class cscd212classes.recovery.RecoveryLinear
The int representing life points to be added when recovering.
